short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WaveMaker Devtool is a debugging and monitoring extension extending Chrome developer tools for WaveMaker application in preview mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The WaveMaker Chrome Extension works for any WaveMaker web application in preview mode for debugging and monitoring. The extension shows all the requests triggered by the previewed application. For each request, the extension shows associated WaveMaker variable, logs and other details like response time, status and more.

Duplicate requests on a page can be quickly identified by using the "Show only duplicates" option. Requests with longer response time can be debugged and the activity that is causing the delay can be identified.
